# mapItem

**Instance Property**

A map item that describes the location of the LookAround scene.

## Declaration

```swift
var mapItem: MKMapItem? { get }
```

## Specifying the request’s location

- **coordinate**: A coordinate value that describes the location of the LookAround scene.

items.description: A coordinate value that describes the location of the LookAround scene.
